title: Remote for Onkyo AV Receivers & Smart TV/Blu-Ray
summary: MyAV is an unofficial Onkyo AV Receiver & universal remote control app. TRIAL.
description: MyAV is an unofficial Onkyo AV Receiver Wi-Fi & IR remote control app. Onkyo is a trademark of the Onkyo corporation. This is a free 7 day trial version of the main "Pro" app.Includes the ability to rename, remove and re-order inputs.MyAV has a DLNA browser as well as an internet radio, USB & Home Media browser This app can be viewed portrait or landscape (default) and is designed with high resolution graphics for tablets.Additionally, MyAV can also control a range of other products (whilst still controlling the volume of your Onkyo). Other devices include Blu-ray players, TVs, set-top boxes, cable & sat.MyAV now supports the control of older non-networked Onkyo AV Receivers using IR (if you have a device that supports IR like a Huawei Honor7, HTC M8/M9 or Samsung S4/S5/S6 Note 3/4 Tab S etc). Alternatively, you can use the Orvibo AllOne, Keene Kira or Global Cache Ethernet to IR blaster.A full compatibility list can be found on our site:http://myav.co.uk/compatiblity.htmCompatible Onkyo network receivers include:2016: TX-NR555 , TX-NR656, TX-RZ710, TX-RZ8102015: TX-NR545 , TX-NR646 (tested), TX-NR747, TX-RZ800, TX-RZ900 2014: TX-NR535 , TX-NR636 (tested), TX-NR737, TX-NR838, TXNR30302013: ONKYO TX-NR525 ONKYO TX-NR626 ONKYO TX-NR727 ONKYO TX-NR828 ONKYO TX-NR9292012: ONKYO TX-NR414 ONKYO TX-NR515 ONKYO TX-NR616 ONKYO TX-NR717 ONKYO TX-NR818 ONKYO TX-NR1010 ONKYO TX-NR3010 ONKYO TX-NR5010 (tested)2011: ONKYO TX-NR509, ONKYO TX-NR609, ONKYO TX-NR709, ONKYO TX-NR809, ONKYO TX-NR1009, ONKYO TX-NR3009, ONKYO TX-NR5009, ONKYO PR-SC5509 2010: ONKYO TX-NR708, ONKYO TX-NR808, ONKYO TX-NR1008, ONKYO TX-NR3008, ONKYO TX-NR5008, PR-SC5508 2009: ONKYO TX-NR807, ONKYO TX-NR1007, ONKYO TX-NR3007, ONKYO TX-NR5007 2008: ONKYO TX-NR906 2007: ONKYO TX-NR905
descriptionHTML:
MyAV is an unofficial Onkyo AV Receiver Wi-Fi & IR remote control app. Onkyo is a trademark of the Onkyo corporation. This is a free 7 day trial version of the main "Pro" app.
Includes the ability to rename, remove and re-order inputs.
MyAV has a DLNA browser as well as an internet radio, USB & Home Media browser
This app can be viewed portrait or landscape (default) and is designed with high resolution graphics for tablets.

Additionally, MyAV can also control a range of other products (whilst still controlling the volume of your Onkyo). Other devices include Blu-ray players, TVs, set-top boxes, cable & sat.

MyAV now supports the control of older non-networked Onkyo AV Receivers using IR (if you have a device that supports IR like a Huawei Honor7, HTC M8/M9 or Samsung S4/S5/S6 Note 3/4 Tab S etc). Alternatively, you can use the Orvibo AllOne, Keene Kira or Global Cache Ethernet to IR blaster.
A full compatibility list can be found on our site:
http://myav.co.uk/compatiblity.htm

Compatible Onkyo network receivers include:
2016: TX-NR555 , TX-NR656, TX-RZ710, TX-RZ810
2015: TX-NR545 , TX-NR646 (tested), TX-NR747, TX-RZ800, TX-RZ900
2014: TX-NR535 , TX-NR636 (tested), TX-NR737, TX-NR838, TXNR3030
2013: ONKYO TX-NR525 ONKYO TX-NR626 ONKYO TX-NR727 ONKYO TX-NR828 ONKYO TX-NR929
2012: ONKYO TX-NR414 ONKYO TX-NR515 ONKYO TX-NR616 ONKYO TX-NR717 ONKYO TX-NR818 ONKYO TX-NR1010 ONKYO TX-NR3010 ONKYO TX-NR5010 (tested)
2011: ONKYO TX-NR509, ONKYO TX-NR609, ONKYO TX-NR709, ONKYO TX-NR809, ONKYO TX-NR1009, ONKYO TX-NR3009, ONKYO TX-NR5009, ONKYO PR-SC5509
2010: ONKYO TX-NR708, ONKYO TX-NR808, ONKYO TX-NR1008, ONKYO TX-NR3008, ONKYO TX-NR5008, PR-SC5508
2009: ONKYO TX-NR807, ONKYO TX-NR1007, ONKYO TX-NR3007, ONKYO TX-NR5007
2008: ONKYO TX-NR906
2007: ONKYO TX-NR905
comments: Single Device Only.  Purchased on Phone wants me to purchase again for tablet.  Ordered Onkyo App but all it controls is my TIVO. Worked fine before I purchased Pro App. Also to many versions of this app to tell which One actually should be used.  And any developer that does not offer refund after finding app lacks function Not cool. Avoid
Unlike the official Onkyo version, this works and works well!

I downloaded the application off rip it asked me to upgrade didn't even give me a chance to use it I have an old receiver I'll kill my last phone worked on it now on my new Galaxy 8 I can't figure it out an application for it
I was looking for such app for many days. Thanks a lot. And I own a 10 years old Onkyo AV receiver. This app is working perfectly fine with it.
Worked really well with my TX-NR616, my Onkyo was automatically detect over the wifi from my Samsung Galaxy S8.
recentChanges: Support for Sky Pro & Sky HD (Cable) Germany
